1.3.1 sass.variables.colors Color system

Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Bootstrap defines a set of all colors, as well as a smaller palette of theme colors and a set of grays.

UW Medicine brand guidelines define a smaller set of colors, which are divided into a primary and secondary palette.

Example
Blue
Indigo
Purple
Pink
Red
Orange
Yellow
Green
Teal
Cyan
Markup: init/colors/colors.twig
